attributes.additional_details:
We, the population of the UK and your bosses, demand an end to any and all closed door agreements. We want exactly what we voted for and were promised. We want a full and complete break from the corrupt mafia styled EU. Everything that is ours is to be returned. No responsibility to correspond with the "no rights" being offered. No transitional period or other procrastination.

WE DEMAND OUT, RIGHT OUT, AND OUT NOW. 

Do it or move aside for someone who will.
attributes.background:
Time and time again we are told the government WILL DELIVER THE BREXIT WE VOTED FOR. But time and time again we hear that promise being broken.
We voted out of the EU, out of everything EU. No Common Market, no ECJ, no PESCO, no more monitory contribution or aid.
FULFIL YOUR PROMISES!!
